[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcajn8fxe[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA stack-based buffer overflow was detected in the Mongoose HTTP library’s custom [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprintf implementation. While processing a fuzzer-generated input through [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_http_parse`, AddressSanitizer flagged a one‐byte write past the end of a [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-allocated buffer in the function `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled via [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow occurs in `fmt.c`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`printf.c` when formatting output, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleading to an immediate program abort.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  During a fuzzing campaign [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlibFuzzer, [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m runs[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, AddressSanitizer reported a [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow in the path:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` →  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_http_parse` →  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `mg_log` →  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. `mg_vxprintf` →  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/mongoose/src/printf.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability type  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack-based buffer overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mCWE-[0m[1;36m121[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in a custom printing routine.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Observations and findings  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow is a single-byte write beyond a local array [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m inside [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe in `fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • ASan reports the write address lies at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, just past the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion in the stack frame.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The crash log shows “[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-write-stack-buffer-overflow” with a scarily high [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m“SCARINESS: [0m[1;36m46[0m[39m.”  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The faulty stack object is named ‘tmp371’ [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdeclared around line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The fuzzer harness simply feeds raw data to `mg_http_parse`; it is not the root[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcause but triggers the vulnerable code path.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Areas for further investigation  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The formatting functions in `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vxprintf`, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39massociated helpers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. The I/O buffer routines in `src/mongoose/src/printf.c` [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, `mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. The interaction in `src/mongoose/src/log.c` where formatted messages are [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mgenerated.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. The HTTP parsing logic in `src/mongoose/src/http.c` that invokes logging and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Any size‐calculation logic for temporary buffers used by the custom printf [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimplementation.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m338[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, n++, i++;[0m                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause & Impact Analysis  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a local buffer `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis used, but the call  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     allows up to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes to be written into an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte array, triggering a [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone-byte overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas reported by ASan[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensuring this buffer is large enough, and matching the passed `dstlen` to its [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual size, will eliminate the overflow without altering any external or harness [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other formatting behaviors, widths, and branching logic remain unchanged. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Continuous reuse of `tmp` for both mantissa and exponent formatting is [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserved.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The I/O buffering [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, `scpy`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and fuzzer harness [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare untouched.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Patch Steps  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Open `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` handling block around lines [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Change the declaration and usage of `tmp` as follows:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace the small buffer with a larger safe buffer, e.g.:  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ­­­­­old:   char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ­­­­­new:   char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Update the `mg_dtoa` call to use the buffer’s actual size:  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ­­­­­old:   k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ­­­­­new:   k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Leave the subsequent `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` and the `mg_lld` invocation unchanged; [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe larger `tmp` buffer also safely accommodates exponent formatting.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Increasing `tmp` from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes eliminates any violation of `[0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`, and provides ample space for both mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to width+decimal[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent digits.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Matching `dstlen` to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` removes magic-number inconsistencies and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuture-proofs against width or formatting changes.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other code paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%g`, `%f`, integer formats, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m already use a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer with `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`—we simply align the `%e` branch with [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat proven, safe pattern.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Testing & Verification  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Recompile and run the existing test suite to ensure no regressions.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Re-run the libFuzzer harness [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m100[0m[39m+ iterations[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m under AddressSanitizer to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirm the stack-buffer overflow is resolved.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally, add a targeted unit test for `%e` formatting with extreme values [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., very large/small doubles[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to validate both content correctness and absence [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof overflows.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Side-Effect Considerations  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The patch only enlarges a local stack buffer and adjusts its associated length[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39margument—no impact on heap management or external APIs.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage increases by ~[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes in this single frame, which is negligible [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor typical call stacks.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to global constants or library interfaces, preserving backward [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompatibility.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Reference Pattern  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch in the same file uses:  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, pr, c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     We adopt identical sizing and `sizeof` usage for consistency and safety.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCode Context for Patch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c, around line [0m[1;36m318[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/mongoose/src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x5636a77a89ff[0m[39m in mg_vxprintf [0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m247[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDEDUP_TOKEN: mg_vxprintf[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  This frame has [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;35mobject[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <== Memory access at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m overflows this [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcajn8fxe[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA libFuzzer run on the Mongoose codebase triggered an AddressSanitizer [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow inside the formatting routines [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vxprintf` in [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow occurs when writing a formatted string into a small [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A patch was attempted to enlarge a different local buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` → `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch and update the [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorresponding `mg_dtoa` call to use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. After rebuilding and rerunning [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzzer, the same stack-buffer-overflow error reappeared at the same stack [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation, indicating the patch did not address the buffer overflow in `tmp371`.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzzing session [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m produced an [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer error:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Location: `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` called via `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `scpy` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ `mg_vxprintf` in `src/fmt.c`.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Error: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write beyond the end of a stack-allocated buffer in the frame of [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstack offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Two local arrays in this frame are reported: [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    - `tmp` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    - `tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Overflow occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, just beyond `tmp371`.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The stack trace shows the overflow occurs when formatting a floating-point [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalue and writing characters out via the internal I/O buffer.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant Observations  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow is on the stack, not in heap memory.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The faulting write happens in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, which writes individual [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes of the formatted output.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The upstream call chain is: `mg_vxprintf` → calls into the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor another branch producing `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → uses `scpy` to copy bytes from a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal buffer to the output function.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The local buffer `tmp371` is too small to hold the formatted string in some [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcases.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `src/fmt.c`, lines around the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` case [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Changed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Modified the call `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    to `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Rebuilt and reran the same fuzz test.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult of Patch  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer still triggers the same stack-buffer-overflow:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Reported at exactly the same stack offset [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the same function [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The failing local buffer is still `tmp371`, not the `tmp` modified by the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow remains in code paths that use `tmp371`, which was not adjusted.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of `mg_vxprintf` in `src/fmt.c`, especially:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - How many and which local buffers are allocated for different format specifiers [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`, `tmp371`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The sizing logic for each buffer and how `mg_dtoa` is called throughout.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definition and behavior of `mg_dtoa`:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Its contract on the output buffer size.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - How it formats the mantissa and exponent into the provided buffer.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `scpy` helper and how it copies buffers of varying lengths:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Ensure it respects the actual length returned by formatting functions.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Other format-specifier branches in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `%g`, `%f`, `%a`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmay use similar fixed-size buffers.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- End-to-end logging path in `mg_log` [0m[35m/[0m[39m `mg_http_parse` where the formatted data [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meventually flows.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis investigation will help identify all buffer-size mismatches and ensure that [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meach formatting path uses appropriately sized or dynamically allocated buffers.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m266[0m[39m:      while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'h'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Treat h and hh as int[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:1[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m150[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"fmt.h"[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"printf.h"[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"util.h"[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m:static bool [0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m:  return c >= [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m && c <= [0m[32m'9'[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m:static const double[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m:ivln10hi  = [0m[1;36m4.34294481878168880939e-01[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3fdbcb7b[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x15200000[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m:ivln10lo  = [0m[1;36m2.50829467116452752298e-11[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3dbb9438[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0xca9aadd5[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m:log10_2hi = [0m[1;36m3.01029995663611771306e-01[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3FD34413[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x509F6000[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m:log10_2lo = [0m[1;36m3.69423907715893078616e-13[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3D59FEF3[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x11F12B36[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m:Lg1 = [0m[1;36m6.666666666666735130e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FE55555 [0m[1;36m55555593[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m15[0m[39m:Lg2 = [0m[1;36m3.999999999940941908e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FD99999 9997FA04 *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m:Lg3 = [0m[1;36m2.857142874366239149e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FD24924 [0m[1;36m94229359[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m:Lg4 = [0m[1;36m2.222219843214978396e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FCC71C5 1D8E78AF *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m:Lg5 = [0m[1;36m1.818357216161805012e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC74664 96CB03DE *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m:Lg6 = [0m[1;36m1.531383769920937332e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC39A09 D078C69F *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:Lg7 = [0m[1;36m1.479819860511658591e-01[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC2F112 DF3E5244 *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m22:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:     [0m[39munion [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mdouble f; uint64_t i;[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m u = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mx[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdouble hfsq,f,s,z,R,w,t1,t2,dk,y,hi,lo,val_hi,val_lo;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:     [0m[39muint64_t hx;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:     [0m[39mint k;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:     [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx < [0m[1;36m0x00100000[0m[39m || hx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i<<[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m/[0m[1;39m([0m[39mx*x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m+[0m[1;36m-0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m=-inf *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* subnormal number, scale x up *[0m[35m/[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mk -= [0m[1;36m54[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:  int64_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Reapply and correct the enlargement of the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` temporary buffer in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch inside `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change the declaration[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     to[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m([0m[39mThis matches the size used in the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch and ensures ample room for[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa and exponent strings.[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Update the mg_dtoa call in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch to pass the true buffer length:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replace the hard-coded dstlen argument [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     becomes[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preserve the existing two-phase exponent formatting:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After emitting the mantissa via `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and writing the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifier character [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the code calls[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     and again[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     The enlarged `tmp` buffer now safely accommodates the integer exponent string [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout risk of overflow.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Review other fixed-size temporary buffers in `mg_vxprintf`:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that no other small local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., for `%a`, `%A`, `%p`, or [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minteger formatting[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are at risk of overflow.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If any similar patterns are found, apply the same “buffer → [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, pass [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m” approach.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Rebuild and rerun the fuzzer:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensure the AddressSanitizer no longer reports a stack-buffer-overflow in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Verify that existing unit tests for formatting [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_snprintf`, `mg_printf`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39metc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m continue to pass unmodified.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow was caused by writing more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa + decimal point + [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte stack buffer.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch already uses a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer, which is known to be [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msufficient for all typical float formatting cases.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Changing only the size of `tmp` and the corresponding dstlen argument preserves [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mall existing formatting logic, including width, precision, and two-step exponent [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput, without touching harness code, external libraries, or tests.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The additional stack footprint [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m per `%e` call is negligible for typical[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muse.[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This approach mirrors an established safe pattern in the same function, ensuring [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconsistency and maintainability.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:30:46][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=294124;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=756272;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
