[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcajn8fxe[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer report revealed a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack-buffer-overflow in the Mongoose [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting code [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vxprintf` → `scpy` → `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs when formatting scientific notation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, writing one byte past the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend of a local buffer. A patch increased the temporary buffer for `%e` formatting [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes and passed its size to `mg_dtoa`. However, the post-patch [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrun shows the same overflow at the same stack offset, indicating the fix did not [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcover the actual buffer being overrun.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A libFuzzer invocation triggers `mg_http_parse`, which logs via `mg_log` → [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, two local buffers exist:  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39moriginal[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at stack offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m][0m[39m  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `char tmp371[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m][0m[39m  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer stack trace pinpoints a write at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mframe, one byte past the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte `tmp371` array.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow is reported in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` when `scpy` writes a [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacter.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey observations in the initial log  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow address lies exactly one byte beyond `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe region [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The bug occurs during formatting of a `%e` or `%E` specifier in [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan’s shadow bytes confirm a stack right redzone violation.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `src/fmt.c` around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m, the code handling `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` was modified:  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  * Original lines:  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  * Patched lines:  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch aimed to provide more room for the DTOA output and to supply the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrect buffer length to `mg_dtoa`.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult after patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A new ASan run reproduces the same stack-buffer-overflow at the same offset in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnow with `tmp371` still at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logged stack frame still reports two local objects [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` and `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe overflow occurs into `tmp371`’s redzone.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No change in the error location or nature—`tmp371` remains the overrun target, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munaffected by the resized `tmp`.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The layout and use of the second temporary buffer `tmp371` in `mg_vxprintf` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, especially around line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m where it is defined.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All calls to `mg_dtoa` and how many characters they may write, ensuring buffers [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpassed to it [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding `tmp371` if used there[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are sized properly.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of `scpy`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static` in printf.c to confirm [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite counts against provided buffer lengths.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Other format specifier branches in `mg_vxprintf` that use fixed-size stack [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:273[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m282[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m273[0m[39m:          c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m274[0m[39m:        bool s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'd'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, h = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'x'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'X'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'p'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m275[0m[39m:        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m276[0m[39m:        size_t xl = x ? [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m : [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m277[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m278[0m[39m:          double v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m279[0m[39m:          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m280[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m281[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_long == [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m282[0m[39m:          int64_t v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause and Context[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte overflow into the second local buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mnamed `tmp371` in the ASan trace[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which corresponds to the `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` in the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf`.  This overflow arises because:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `mg_dtoa` is told it can write up to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m characters [0m[1;39m([0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and may [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproduce more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes of output.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `scpy` blindly reads `k` bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe return value of `mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from that [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, overrunning its [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte boundary.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A previous patch increased the *first* `tmp` in the generic `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, but left the *second* `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` untouched.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must continue to use the same `mg_dtoa` → `scpy` → `out` sequence for [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting the mantissa, then emit the `e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`E` character, then use `mg_lld` to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat the exponent.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The user-supplied precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is already handled in the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` path; [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor consistency and correctness it should also govern the number of digits after [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe decimal in `%e` formatting.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No harness or fuzzing logic changes are needed—this is purely in the [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting code.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Outline[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch inside `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m327[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Change the small buffer to match the generic branch:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        with[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Honor the precision specifier rather than hard-coding [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Before computing exponent/mantissa, add[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;`[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        to default to [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m digits when no precision is specified.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        with[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m The call to `mg_lld` can remain using the same `tmp` buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnow [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msince the largest possible exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39m“+[0m[1;36m308[0m[39m” or “[0m[1;36m-308[0m[39m”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m requires at most [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m bytes [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mplus null.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - No change is needed for:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Keep the two subsequent `scpy` calls exactly as they are, relying on `tmp` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeing sufficiently large.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Post-Patch Verification[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run the full test suite under AddressSanitizer; the stack-buffer-overflow in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `%e` branch should disappear.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that other format specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%g`, `%f`, `%d`, `%x`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munaffected by this change.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Perform manual tests of `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` with various precisions [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. `%.2e`, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%.10E`, default `%e`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure correct behavior.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Rationale[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Matching the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer size used in the neighboring branches ensures any [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput from `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich itself uses a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte internal buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m cannot overflow[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe stack.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for `dstlen` guarantees consistency if the buffer size is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mever adjusted again.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Honoring the `pr` variable not only prevents future mismatches but also aligns[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%e` handling with `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g`, preserving the intended API.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This addresses the exact symptom [0m[1;39m([0m[39moverflow into the redzone at `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout touching auxiliary functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`scpy`, `mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or harness[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode, and retains all existing tests and fuzz targets.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. References[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar fix in the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch at `src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:273[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m282[0m[39m`, which allocates [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and calls `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ASan traces consistently point to the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer in the `%e` branch as [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe overrun site; enlarging it resolves the issue.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:32:34][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=320849;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=482264;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:33:44][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.ANALYZE -> TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m                     ]8;id=710118;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=571938;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[12/24/25 22:34:27][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=515126;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=98170;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcajn8fxe[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a one-byte stack-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the function `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, called from `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` via [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy` inside `mg_vxprintf`. The overflow occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the stack frame [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof `mg_vxprintf`, overflowing the local buffer labeled `tmp371`.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was attempted in `src/fmt.c` to increase the size of a local buffer used [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` format specifier [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchanging `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpass the new length into `mg_dtoa`, and to set a default precision. After applying [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch and rebuilding, the same stack-buffer-overflow error recurred at the same[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation and stack offset, indicating the change did not resolve the overflow.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer hit a crash during HTTP parsing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_http_parse`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when logging formatted [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_log` → `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer report:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write overflow at stack address `[0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…fb78`, thread T0  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Faulty write originates in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Call chain: `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` → `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `scpy` → [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` → formatting routines → fuzzer entrypoint  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Overflow occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf`’s stack frame  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Two local objects in frame:  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – `tmp` at bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – `tmp371` at bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The access at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m overruns `tmp371`.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Edited file `src/fmt.c` around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m in function `mg_vxprintf`:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Expanded buffer for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formats from `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Introduced `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;` to default precision.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Changed call to `mg_dtoa` to use the new buffer size:  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Left the subsequent integer-to-string call [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munchanged.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Rebuilt and re-ran the fuzzer:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The same AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow recurred at the same code [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation and offset.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow remains in the `mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m` frame at `scpy`.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The layout and lifetime of the two local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` and `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`—particularly how and when `tmp371` is used outside the patched block.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementations of `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` to verify that they respect the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer length parameters and do not write beyond supplied bounds.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `scpy` function and its interaction with format routines to ensure correct [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccounting of written bytes.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All format-specifier cases in `mg_vxprintf`, not only `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`, to identify [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother potential buffer-size mismatches.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Reapply and correct the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replace the small [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` buffer with a larger buffer for the mantissa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g. `char mantbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Introduce a separate buffer for the exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. `char expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mavoid reusing and potentially overflowing the same stack space.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Immediately after reading the precision `pr`, set a default precision if none [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas specified:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Compute the exponent and mantissa as before:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       double mantissa   = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call `mg_dtoa` with the full size of the mantissa buffer and the [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpossibly [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdefaulted[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m precision:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, true[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Use `scpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbounded by `k`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to emit the mantissa; then emit the literal format[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacter [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m` or `[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, mantbuf, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n++;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Format the exponent into the separate `expbuf`:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexpbuf, exponent, [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m[33mis_signed[0m[39m=*[0m[35m/[0m[95m1[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m[33mis_hex[0m[39m=*[0m[35m/[0m[95m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, expbuf, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Rationale:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The original overflow was caused by a tiny [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m being [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39masked to hold:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m A mantissa string via `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` which could write up to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes, and[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Then an exponent string via `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` which may exceed [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarge exponents.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Expanding to `mantbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa` ensures [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat `mg_dtoa` never writes out of bounds.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A separate `expbuf` prevents the exponent formatting from corrupting the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa buffer’s red zone or itself.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Using `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, …, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` remains safe because `k`—the return value of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe formatting functions—is always ≤ the supplied buffer size.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preservation of existing logic:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other format specifiers and branches in `mg_vxprintf` remain untouched.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We still honor user-specified precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and default to [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m if [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munspecified, matching the behavior of `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f`.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The output order—mantissa, the literal `e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`E`, then exponent—is unchanged.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzing harnesses and `scpy` behavior are unmodified.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Side effects and mitigation:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage increases slightly [0m[1;39m([0m[39m≈[0m[1;36m60[0m[39m extra bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but remains negligible [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompared to existing buffers.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No new dependencies or external functions are introduced.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Unit tests and existing code paths for other specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding `%g`, `%f`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%d`, `%x`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are unaffected.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Similar patterns in the code:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch already uses a `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and passes `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` with default precision logic. We replicate that safety pattern here.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes are needed in `mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`, or `scpy` themselves.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Summary steps to implement:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Edit `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Replace the block guarded by `else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m` with [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe outlined code above.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Keep the rest of `mg_vxprintf` intact.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Rebuild and repro with AddressSanitizer to confirm no overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:34:50][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=474106;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=500808;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, mantbuf, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <== Memory access at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m overflows this [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHINT: this may be a false positive if your program uses some custom stack unwind [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmechanism, swapcontext or vfork[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlongjmp and C++ exceptions *are* supported[0m[1;39m)[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSUMMARY: AddressSanitizer: stack-buffer-overflow [0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[39m in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mShadow bytes around the buggy address:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m0x7ffadfb6f880[0m[39m: f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m0x7ffadfb6f900[0m[39m: f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5 f5[0m                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m0x7ffadfb6fc00[0m[39m: f1 f1 f1 f1 [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m f2 f2 f2 f2 [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m f3[0m                   [2m                [0m
