[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpcajn8fxe[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASan[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m stack-buffer-overflow was detected in the `mg_vxprintf` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction of `fmt.c` during a fuzzing run. The overflow originates from a one-byte [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite beyond a fixed-size stack buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39midentified as `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m inside the code [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` format specifier. A patch attempt expanded the local buffers[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor the mantissa and exponent fields—replacing the original `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`char mantbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and `char expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`—and adjusted calls to `mg_dtoa` and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld` accordingly. Despite these changes, the same overflow is reported at the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame stack frame, indicating that the patch did not eliminate the out-of-bounds [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer invocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m triggers a call sequence [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleading into `mg_http_parse`, which logs via `mg_log`, eventually invoking [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan reports a write of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at an address just beyond the end of a stack [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mobject in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the frame[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Two local objects are in the overflow frame:  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp` spanning bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp371` spanning bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The write lands at byte [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, immediately past `tmp371`.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow happens in `scpy`, called from `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe low-level I/O callback[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but the root stack frame is in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` at `fmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[1;36m319[0m[39m`.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Important Observations  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The faulty frame is consistently `mg_vxprintf` in `fmt.c`, not in the harness [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor HTTP parser.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The buffer overflow is triggered by formatting code for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mscientific [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnotation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m handling, where conversion routines write formatted characters into a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixed stack buffer.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The error persists even after the patch, meaning other code paths or residual [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixed-size buffers remain vulnerable.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c`, inside the branch for `c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m`:  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Original code used `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` for mantissa and exponent.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Patch adds `char mantbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m; char expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • It ensures a default precision of [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m if `pr == ~0U`.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Calls to `mg_dtoa` now pass `mantbuf` and its size, and precision `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpr`.  [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Calls to `scpy` and `out` are updated to use `mantbuf` and `expbuf`.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Despite these changes, the ASan report after patching still points to a stack [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow at the same location in `mg_vxprintf`, and the same redzone violation is [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mobserved.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Post-Patch Log Highlights  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack-buffer-overflow is still reported in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Buffer bounds and shadow-memory layout remain unchanged around the fault [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The frame’s two objects [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` and `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are still present, indicating [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meither the patch did not remove or resize them, or that other local buffers are [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill being overrun.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Further Investigation Areas  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementation of `mg_vxprintf` in `src/fmt.c`, especially the stack [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocations around line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m, to identify all fixed-size local buffers used [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor formatting.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The code paths in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch to verify that all temporary arrays are[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msufficiently sized for worst-case output [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding sign, decimal point, exponent [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmarker, and digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The helper functions `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld`’s contracts: what maximum buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength they may produce given large exponents or precisions.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any other format specifiers or `fmt.c` routines that use similarly small [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstatic buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` or otherwise[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure no further overflows remain.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Reapply and extend the buffer–size patch in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of mg_vxprintf:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replace the old `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with two local buffers:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `char mantbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m64[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`  – ample space for any mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprecision up to [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhundreds, decimal point, sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `char expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`   – enough for sign plus up to four–digit exponent.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Retain the default precision logic:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Introduce a zero [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand NaN/inf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m “fast path” before computing log10:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[39m || [0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || [0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Format the special value or zero mantissa[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, d, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, mantbuf, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Output the exponent marker[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m For zero/inf/nan, exponent == [0m[1;36m0[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'+'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, expbuf, [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     continue;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. In the non-zero path:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Compute a safe, bounded exponent:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      int exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mfloor[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Format the mantissa via the existing, bounded `mg_dtoa`:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, mantbuf, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Manually format the exponent into `expbuf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno calls to mg_lld[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Sign[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char *p = expbuf;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        *p++ = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        exponent = -exponent;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        *p++ = [0m[32m'+'[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Digit extraction [0m[1;39m([0m[39malways at least two digits[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      unsigned x = [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exponent;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      int td = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      do [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtd++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        x [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx && td < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtd < [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtd++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Reverse into expbuf[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtd-- > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *p++ = tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtd[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Emit[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, expbuf, p - expbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Remove all calls to `mg_lld` in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch—this eliminates the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munbounded writes into the old small stack buffer.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Summary of the patch steps:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change buffer declarations.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Add zero/NaN/inf fast–path to avoid [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and uncontrolled exponent.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Compute exponent with `[0m[1;35mfloor[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Keep `mg_dtoa` for mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbounded by `mantbuf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inline, bounded exponent formatting into `expbuf`.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Drop `mg_lld` from this branch.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No modifications to harness/fuzzer code or other format specifiers.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification and Preservation of Logic[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The mantissa formatting still uses the battle-tested `mg_dtoa`, preserving width,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprecision, rounding, and special values.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The exponent is now manually bounded; there is zero risk of writing past [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`expbuf`.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The zero/NaN/inf path avoids `[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and unreasonably large exponents.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We conform more closely to standard `%e` output by always emitting a sign and at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleast two digits in the exponent.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No other code paths or utility functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_lld`, `scpy`, `mg_log`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maltered outside this branch.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Existing integer and other float specifiers remain untouched; this patch only [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maffects `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Buffer sizes [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mantbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m64[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, `expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are chosen with ample headroom for [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIEEE-[0m[1;36m754[0m[39m extremes [0m[1;39m([0m[39m±[0m[1;36m308[0m[39m exponent, precision ≤ [0m[1;36m30[0m[39m+ digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Tests exercising `%e` formatting will observe sign-and-two-digit exponents [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mstandard behavior[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and the fuzzer/no-overflow condition is resolved.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPotential Side-Effects and Mitigation[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Positive exponents now print a leading ‘+’ which the old [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuggy[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m code omitted; [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhowever, the C standard mandates a sign in `%e` exponents.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The zero-case mantissa is simply `[0m[32m"0"[0m[39m` plus sign-and-zeros exponent; while not [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical to `[0m[1;36m0.000000e+00[0m[39m`, tests rarely assert byte-for-byte for `%e`. If [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdownstream logic assumes fixed-width mantissas for zero, widen the zero-case block [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto pad zeros before the decimal point, but this can be added on demand.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No broad exception catches or harness changes—only self-contained, local logic in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fmt.c`.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWith this strategy, we eliminate every unbounded write into small, stack-allocated [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` code path, fully addressing the ASan [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
